about_the_game:
Welcome 10 new Aces to Steel Division 2 in the free Reinforcement Pack #14, Aces of Steel Division 2.
Aces are historically noteworthy soldiers, commanders, or airmen paired with a trademark unit that features exclusive camouflage, paint jobs, portraits, and markings. Steel Division 2 Aces don’t provide any additional gameplay advantage.
Two sets of new Aces are featured: several original war heroes from Steel Division: Normandy ‘44 have crossed over to Steel Division 2, while the other half are completely brand-new.

MAIN FEATURES:

  • The Axis see 5 new Aces join their ranks. Be the 12. SS-Panzerdivision’s lucky tank commander Willy Kretzschmar and his battle-damaged “536” Panzer IV or go behind enemy lines as the legendary Finnish deep reconnaissance and special forces leader Lauri Törni in the Axis’ Raapaana division. Get back into combat as the 28. Jäger-Division’s infantry assault sergeant Walter Möse, lead your Romanian tankmen in the 1 Blindata as Ion S. Dumitru in his T.4 Comanda, or take to the skies with the Hungarian Me-109G-6/R6 fighter pilot “Old Puma” Aladar Heppes.
  • The Allies also march with 5 new Aces to war. Be a one-man Canadian army with Leo Major as a Sniper-Scout for the 3rd Canadian Infantry Division or rule supreme as France’s premier fighter ace Pierre Clostermann in his 2e Division Blindée’sSpitfire Mk. IX. Assault the objective first as the daring 6th Airborne Division’s Major John Howard, inspire as tank commander Lafayette Green “Wardaddy” Pool and his CMD M4A1 as featured in the U.S. 3rd Armored Division or provide air superiority as the Allied Soviet fighter pilot Ivan Savel’Evich Kravcov in his 7. Eesti’s La-5FN fighter.

Two sets of new Aces are featured: several original war heroes from Steel Division: Normandy ‘44 have crossed over to Steel Division 2, while the other half are completely brand-new.

legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: Steel Division 2 - Reinforcement Pack #14 - Aces

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome 10 new Aces to Steel Division 2 with the free Reinforcement Pack #14. A mix of original Steel Division: Normandy ‘44 and new legendary soldiers, commanders, and airmen join the fight. Paired with their trademark unit, Aces feature unique camouflage, paint jobs, markings, and portraits.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
